missing_empathy: Add a quick empathy line before solving.
missing_solutionize: Offer the concrete fix that’s within barista empowerment.
empowerment_overreach: Baristas can replace live orders; discounts/refunds need a MOD.
missing_thank: Close the loop with a genuine thank-you or assurance.
aggregator_boundary: Politely route aggregator issues through the app flow.
repeat_claim: Avoid repeating the customer’s claim verbatim.
Use neutral wording: 'I’m really sorry; this isn’t a great experience.'
